sourcesContent:
<template>
  All data
  Data: {{test}}
</template>

<script>
import {inject, onMounted, onUnmounted, ref} from "vue";
import {cleanClient, setupClient} from "@/composables/mqttMethods";

export default {
  name: "AllData",

  setup: function () {
    const clientPromise = inject('mqttClient')  //injected mqttClient Promise Object (provided in App.vue)
    const subscribedTopics = ['hello', 'world', 'bitch']; //Array containing the subscribed topics for this component
    let connected = ref(false); //Boolean value that indicates if the client is connected to the broker

    /**
     * Execute when the component is mounted
     */
    onMounted(() => {
      mounted = true
      setupClient(clientPromise, subscribedTopics, mqttCallBack)
    });

    /**
     * Execute when the component is unmounted
     */
    onUnmounted(()=> {
      mounted = false
      cleanClient(clientPromise, subscribedTopics)
    });

    const mqttCallBack = (mqttClient) => {
      //Listen for changes and update variables
      updateVariables(mqttClient)
    }


    /*--------------------------------- Incoming Values related methods and variables --------------------------------*/
    let test = ref(NaN);
    let mounted = false;  //indicate if the Home component is mounted

    /**
     * Listen to incoming messages and update variables accordingly
     */
    function updateVariables(mqttClient){
      //Update connected status correctly
      if(mqttClient.connected) connected.value = true
      mqttClient.on('connect', () => connected.value = true)
      mqttClient.on('disconnect', () => connected.value = false)
      mqttClient.on('reconnect', () => connected.value = false)

      mqttClient.on('message', (topic, message)=>{
        if(mounted){
          console.log("topic: " + topic, ",", "message: " + message.toString())
          test.value = message
        }
      })
    }

    return test;

  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
